panel.label: 人群
panel.name: people_panel

string.name: no_recent_people
string.value: No recent people. Looking for people to hang out with? Try [secondlife:///app/search/people Search] or the [secondlife:///app/worldmap World Map].

string.name: no_filtered_recent_people
string.value: Didn't find what you're looking for? Try [secondlife:///app/search/people/[SEARCH_TERM] Search].

string.name: no_one_near
string.value: No one nearby. Looking for people to hang out with? Try [secondlife:///app/search/people Search] or the [secondlife:///app/worldmap World Map].

string.name: no_one_filtered_near
string.value: Didn't find what you're looking for? Try [secondlife:///app/search/people/[SEARCH_TERM] Search].

panel.string: Find friends using [secondlife:///app/search/people Search] or right-click on a Resident to add them as a friend. Looking for people to hang out with? Try the [secondlife:///app/worldmap World Map].
Didn't find what you're looking for? Try [secondlife:///app/search/people/[SEARCH_TERM] Search].

string.name: no_filtered_groups_msg
string.value: 沒有發現你要找的嗎？何不試試 [secondlife:///app/search/groups/[SEARCH_TERM] 搜尋]。

string.name: no_groups_msg
string.value: 想找尋群組加入嗎？何不試試 [secondlife:///app/search/groups 搜尋]。

string.name: MiniMapToolTipMsg
string.value: [REGION]（雙擊以開啟地圖，按下 shift 鍵拖曳來平移）

string.name: AltMiniMapToolTipMsg
string.value: [REGION]（雙擊以瞬間傳送，按下 shift 鍵拖曳來平移）

button.name: add_friend_btn
button.tool_tip: 添加已選擇的居民到Ad你的朋友清單

button.name: add_btn
button.tool_tip: 向居民提出加為好友邀請

dnd_button.name: del_btn
dnd_button.tool_tip: 由你的朋友清單移除所選擇的人

button.name: add_friend_btn
button.tool_tip: 添加所選的居民到你的朋友清單

button.label: 檔案
button.name: view_profile_btn
button.tool_tip: 顯示圖片、群組與其他居民資訊
